message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, I have to consider the value of the product and the benefits it will bring to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $15000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Can you consider that price?

I understand you're still interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I have to prioritize the value of the product and my own business goals. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $14500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's worth.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above the price I'm willing to pay. I'd be willing to meet you at $14000. Can you consider that price?

I understand you're still interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $14200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's worth.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above the price I'm willing to pay. I'd be willing to meet you at $13800. Can you consider that price?

I understand you're still interested in the product, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $13900. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's worth. If you're still not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above the price I'm willing to pay. I'd be willing to meet you at $13500. If you can't meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
